name: Nao Sei Falar Ingles
description:
This game is my entry to the GMTK game jam 2020. The theme is "Out of Controll" so I decided to make a topdown shooter where you have to escape a building.

The catch is: you don't have much controll over your character. You can't move it directly, but when you hit an enemy you get instantly teleported to its location.

At first it might not seem as "out of controll" or as "intense" as the theme suggest, but, when you add a ton of enemies to fight at the same time along with lights that turn on and off and some moving platform, it gets pretty frenetic.

Please give it a try, all you gotta do is download the zip file, extract its file and run the "GMTK.exe" file .       :D

By the way. I didn't have much time to draw some coll looking sprites, so.. yeah xD
